headline: 3 Healthcare Stocks We Steer Clear Of
summary: Personal health and wellness is one of the many secular tailwinds for healthcare companies. But speed bumps such as inventory destockings have persisted in the wake of COVID-19, limiting growth. This has capped returns as the industry’s six-month gain of 9.8% has lagged the S&P 500’s 22.6% climb.
